      • removePhysics

        public void removePhysics()

      • restrictNonPhysics

        public void restrictNonPhysics()

      • setMotionSource

        public void setMotionSource(int motionSource)
        The transform source is where the physics object gets its object to world transform matrix from. Options are PHYSICS, ANIMATION, NONE, OTHER, and VARIABLE. OTHER uses the transformObject and just clones its transform. Useful for graphically attaching objects to other objects. VARIABLE uses transformVariable directly. Make sure to sync its pointer so that it can be mutable! No repeated setting required!
